davWallet.title: Your DAV Wallet
davWallet.text: DAV coins are being granted to users with every ride they take, and later enable them to pay for rides

novehicles.description: As soon as you add your first vehicle, it will appear here

available.title: Switch to Available?
available.text: Your vehicle will be available for rides

notavailable.title: Switch to Not Available?
notavailable.text: Your vehicle will not be available for rides

maintenance.title: Switch to Maintenance?
maintenance.text: Your vehicle will be unlocked and will not be available for rides

noVehiclesOfType.text: There are no vehicles in this state

phone.description: Add your mobile phone number to get started

code.title: Validate phone
code.text: An SMS with the code has been sent to

t&c.text: By using this app, you agree to the DAV

updateRequired.text: A new version of DAV is ready for download. Please update the app in order to continue using it.
updateRequired.title: Update Required
